settings.title: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.text: Yes, we offer free premium shipping on orders over $80.

settings.title: Can I return the item(s) if I don‚Äôt like them?
settings.text: Yes, you can return your order within 30 days of receiving it.

settings.title: How can I track my order?
settings.text: You can track your order by entering the tracking number you received from us on the "TRACK YOUR ORDER" page. Once you‚Äôve entered the number and clicked "TRACK," you will see the status of your order.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.text: You can pay safely and securely with the following payment methods: PayPal, Credit Card, Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Maestro, and Shop Pay.

settings.title: Will I receive a confirmation email after placing an order?
settings.text:
Yes, once you've placed your order, a confirmation will be sent to your email inbox. If you don‚Äôt see it, feel free to reach out to our customer service team, we‚Äôre happy to help you right away.

Email: Info@velysta.co
